snippet.title: Bishoujo Battle Mahjong Solitaire Gameplay Movie
snippet.description:
This is a gameplay movie of Bishoujo Battle Mahjong Solitaire, developed by Zoo Corporation, released on Steam on May 21st 2021.

Steam Page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1301480/Bishoujo_Battle_Mahjong_Solitaire/

The Bishoujo girls from "Rick G Earth" mobile military turn-based strategy game from Japan are here! And they want to go head-to-head in a battle of Mahjong Solitaire. Delete all tiles before time runs out to clear rounds. 

Find pairs of Mahjong tiles to remove them from the board. Time will run out if you are too slow, or if you didn’t plan your moves ahead.

Over 100 different tile layouts are available, with randomized patterns for endless replayability.


◇Check out more information
Sticky Rice Games (PR Agent for Zoo Corporation)
https://stickyricegames.com/games/
Twitter:
https://twitter.com/StickyRiceGames
Facebook:
